data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Praia, Cape Verde.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Praia, Cape Verde

data.prayer: Lord, make the 13,931 believers in Praia to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 152,669 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Father, help your children in Praia, Cape Verde find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Over 14.05 percent of the people of Praia are far from Jesus.
Spirit, help the church in the state of Praia do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Father, your Word is essential for life and growth. Please challenge the 129,269 cultural Christians in the state of Praia to read your Word for themselves today.
data.verse: It is written: 'Man shall not live by bread alone, but by every word that comes from the mouth of God.'

data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Praia, Cape Verde to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.section_summary:
the state of Praia, Cape Verde has a population of 166,600.

We estimate Praia has 13,931 people who might know Jesus, 129,269 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 23,400 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 11 neighbors who need Jesus.
